channel.title: DS Pledge, Reflection & Ethical Skill on s2153581-Chew Chi Hsiang
channel.description: Recent content in DS Pledge, Reflection & Ethical Skill on s2153581-Chew Chi Hsiang

item.title: Section 1: DS Pledge
item.description: As a Master of Data Science student, I promise to uphold the values of responsibility, objectivity, and honesty in my study of and use of data science as a Master of Data Science student. I acknowledge that data could influence decisions and people’s lives, and I pledge to use this power in an ethical and responsible manner. I therefore promise to do the following: I will approach data science with openness and honesty, making sure that information is gathered, examined, and evaluated honestly.

item.title: Section 2: DS Reflection
item.description: As a student pursuing a master’s degree in data science, I have become increasingly aware of the significant influence that data may have on our environment. I have experienced its transformational impact and the limitless opportunities it presents for tackling challenging issues and coming to wise judgments. But I’ve also grown quite conscious of the moral issues and obligations that come with this authority. Here are some key reflections that I have gathered along my journey:
